channel.title: What is the world coming to?
channel.description:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jonathon_Sharkey Running for US president?
Sharkey claims to drink the blood of his girlfriends and mistresses twice a week. He has described his vampirism as "a very healthy thing to do" and has praised Hollywood for making vampire feeding practices "romantic and erotic". He does not drink men's blood, only women's because "women are beautiful...they have such beautiful necks and arms". He claims he first drank blood at age five. He also drinks cow and pig blood, preferring the former. Sharkey claims to have fangs and to be the "King of the Vampire Nation".
Is this like political trolling or something?

item.title: What is the world coming to?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I like how people keep saying racism applies only to black people. I’ve noticed this occurs with gender segregation as well where women always go “you’re just being racist to us” no matter what they do…

Read full topic
item.source: What is the world coming to?

item.title: What is the world coming to?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:24, topic:400641”]Ill try to find the direct video of him saying it for ya.

it may be from how im viewing it but i didnt hear anything racist. i just heard speculation and maybe fact if they have evidence. i am not racist and would like to c the world at peace and everyone being nice to one another all the time… but one racist thing from the 2008 election was anyone who voted on obama on the mere idea(what im saying here is that all they cared about was he was black, and had no care about his politics) of him being black and to be the first black president, both those to me is racist but not exactly the same as what people normally think racism is. “Moreover, racism is the practice of the different treatment of certain a group or groups”(http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Racism)

Read full topic
item.source: What is the world coming to?

item.title: What is the world coming to?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:22, topic:400641”][quote author=Diligo Deum link=topic=497703.msg3639694#msg3639694 date=1308872397]

[quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=497703.msg3639687#msg3639687 date=1308872021]

“Whats is the world coming to” Implying that the word wasn’t shitty like this before. Tbh we need a celebrity as president, at least then we could vote for bills to pass like they do on American Idol.
[/quote]True, we were stupid enough to elect Obama. Unfortunately the left just bows their head to everything Obama says.

Well Obama wasn’t the worst idea, we had a small amount of choices, so it was either the black guy, the raciest old guy who hates Mexicans, or the chick from Alaska that isn’t much to look at.

Stephen Colbert should run.

Was just about to say that lol.
[/quote]John McCain wasn’t racist, I think he was a pretty good candidate.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2TjWjabvJGM I beg to differ, you should see some of the stuff this guy really says (obviously the puppet was played up a little for the show lol) but basically thats along the lines of what he believes.[/quote]

i would have to watch interviews of mccain but really to take info from either colbert or jon stewart is almost like taking info from a wikipedia page giving u a warning that some of the content may not be accurate.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @hawkgames hawkgames
item.description:
@hawkgames wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:13, topic:400641”][quote author=hawkgames link=topic=497703.msg3639625#msg3639625 date=1308869295]
Obliviously none were confirmed, it’s a knock off of Jesus and both of them probably never happened (I’m atheist).
[/quote]
Just wondering if you define yourself as explicit or implicit.

[quote author=Diligo Deum link=topic=497703.msg3639639#msg3639639 date=1308869909]

[quote author=casey. link=topic=497703.msg3639635#msg3639635 date=1308869746]
It’s America. Anyone can run for president(provided they meet the requirements)
[/quote]I know, but it’s just kind of weird that he would even try to run.
[/quote]I don’t think it is too absurd to believe that someone wants power.[quote author=reyx7 link=topic=497703.msg3639648#msg3639648 date=1308870272]
I was gonna vote for this guy, but then I heard Ron Paul was going to make all illegal drugs legal.
[/quote][/quote]

This is probably what happened.

e3eed58f2e9707bfa5877d1c58f8a795.png715×168

item.title: What is the world coming to?
item.dc:creator: @hawkgames hawkgames
item.description:
@hawkgames wrote:

Sharkey was investigated by the United States Secret Service for threatening to impale President Bush. Agents visited the then-42-year-old Sharkey at home with his 19-year-old then-wife, Spree, and reportedly said it was their job to protect Bush even after he left office. A spokesman for the Secret Service said that he didn’t believe the investigation was an overreaction. He has also been jailed in Tennessee for making threats against an Indiana judge. Investigators confiscated two rifles and a wooden stake with spikes at his house. While in Tennessee he had reportedly attempted to set up a colony for vampires.He has also been accused of “brainwashing” a 16-year-old girl in Minnesota, whose family now has a restraining order against him, and has admitted to harassing another 16-year-old Minnesota girl online.

Gl.

Read full topic

item.description:

Is he like the anti-Christ or something?

Sharkey claims to have performed many miracles, however none were confirmed. Some of these include walking on water, turning bread into lemonade, and lighting metal on fire through touch.
